    "the group algebra @xmath2 , where @xmath1 is a locally compact group with a left invariant haar measure @xmath3 ,  is one of the important examples of * - algebras ( see , for example , @xcite , ch .",
    "vi , @xmath4 28 ) .",
    "it is known that any nonsingular continuous * -representation @xmath5 of the * -algebra @xmath0 in a hilbert space @xmath6 is generated by the corresponding continuous unitary representation @xmath7 of @xmath1 in @xmath6 , and a subspace @xmath8 , is invariant with respect to @xmath5 if and only if @xmath9 is invariant with respect to @xmath7 ( @xcite , ch .",
    "vi , @xmath4 29 ) .",
    "since any unitary representation of @xmath1 is completely reducible ( @xcite , @xmath4 7 , 7.3 ) , any nonsingular continuous * -representation of the group algebra @xmath0 in the hilbert space is also completely reducible .",
    "is the same true for any nonsingular continuous representation of algebra @xmath0 in banach spaces ? in this case for the representation of algebra @xmath0 one can not expect a preservation of the involution and , therefore , the structure of @xmath0 as of a banach algebra without its * - properties is important .",
    "in this paper it is shown that every nonsingular continuous representation of the group algebra @xmath0 in banach spaces is completely reducible if and only if @xmath1 is a compact group .",
    "it is also shown that representation @xmath5 of algebra @xmath0 in a banach space is completely reducible if and only if there exists an eigenvector @xmath10 for eigenfuncional @xmath11 such that @xmath12 .",

    "it is known ( @xcite ) that every strongly continuous representation of a compact group in a banach space is completely reducible .",
    "the next theorem states that every @xmath98 - group is a compact group .   "abstract_text": [
    "<S> it is shown that every nonsingular continuous representation of the group algebra @xmath0 in banach spaces is completely reducible if and only if @xmath1 is a compact group .    </S>",
    "<S> * v.i.chilin *    department of mathematics ,    national university of uzbekistan ,    vuzgorodok , 100174 , tashkent , uzbekistan    e - mail : chilin@ucd.uz    * k.k.muminov *    department of mathematics ,    national university of uzbekistan ,    vuzgorodok , 100174 , tashkent , uzbekistan    e - mail : m.muminov@rambler.ru    [ section ]    [ theorem]definition    [ theorem]corollary    [ theorem]lemma    [ theorem]example    * mathematics subject classification : * 22d12 , 22g20 , 46h15 . </S>",
    "<S> + * keywords : * locally compact group , group algebra , continuous representation . </S>"
